Tanjun CSS

Responsive, scalable, customizable, simple and made for your project by you

If you are aiming to find the best all purpose CSS library, you will end up with predefined styles and your HTML class attribute might end up with a huge list of CSS classes.

You can definitely do better and create a library from scratch, but you might end up spending quite some time setting up all the project structure, grids, breakpoints, helpers for your text, etc.

Make use of Tanjun CSS? it will help you keep the HTML syntax clean by composing and creating your own CSS rules.

If not, at least you might get some ideas from this project that will help you to successfully build your own.
